items.summary: Generate a modern, clean logo image for 'The Bharat PDF' with green as the primary color, white/light background support, minimal SaaS style, incorporating a simple PDF/document/file icon element, using a smooth modern font with flat design (no heavy gradients), optimized for header display at desktop and mobile sizes
Generate a favicon version of The Bharat PDF logo optimized for small sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48 pixels) with the same green theme and recognizable PDF/document icon element

Update the Navbar component to display the new logo image in place of the current text-based branding, ensuring it blends perfectly with the existing UI without modifying any layout, functionality, or navigation structure
Update frontend/index.html to reference the new favicon files, replacing any existing favicon references without modifying other meta tags or HTML structure
